# typeIdentifier

**Type Property**

A key that indicates the type of the font feature.

## Declaration

```swift
static let typeIdentifier: NSFontDescriptor.FeatureKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object specifying a font feature type such as ligature, character shape, and so on. For more information on Apple Fonts see[https://developer.apple.com/fonts/] and the [https://developer.apple.com/fonts/TrueType-Reference-Manual/RM09/AppendixF.html].

## Feature Keys

- **selectorIdentifier**: A key that indicates the selector of the font feature.
